solution_line_template: After the 50% discount, the t-shirt cost {original_price_tshirt} * {discount_factor} = $<<{original_price_tshirt}*{discount_factor}={discounted_tshirt_price}>>{discounted_tshirt_price}.
So in all, the {num_friends} friends spent {num_friends} * ${discounted_tshirt_price} = $<<{num_friends}*{discounted_tshirt_price}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
